website_summaries.verdict: The Vasque Mantra 2.0 proved that a low-cut hiking shoe can deliver on trails in terms of support, breathability, and comfort. What it missed to address though, as testified, is traction on wet grounds. Everything considered, the satisfying good points of the Vasque Mantra 2.0 still makes it a likable hiking shoe, however, it may be best to use it on dry grounds.
pros: The Vasque Mantra 2.0 delivered straight-out-of-the-box comfort, as testified by an abundance of outdoor enthusiasts
Heaps of owners were surprised about how well this hiking shoe performed on trails and daily activities
Despite its rugged look, it did not require breaking in at all, as exclaimed by an army of hikers
A bunch of users gave the breathability of the Mantra 2.0 a thumbs up
Its low-cut design did not hinder it from being supportive, as noted by a lot of grateful wearers
A considerable number of online buyers commented that it fits perfectly
cons: The Mantra 2.0 hiking shoe from Vasque left several brand loyalists upset when the toe cap started to peel off too soon
Based on a good number of user reviews, it had poor traction on wet surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, but It's a Little Tight for Me
customer_reviews.text: I first fell in love with Vasque trail runners with the Blur model. I've tried a number of other models since they discontinued the Blur. This is the closest for me to the Blur. It's comfortable although my toes do touch the front (in the morning) so I should have gone up a half size. Still, it's not so bad that I need to return them. I like the weight (a little heavier than the Grand Traverse) and the feel where the ties are. It's a terrific and the only thing that keeps me from giving it 5 stars is the fit. That may be I just have a flatter foot now.
customer_reviews.author: Former Guru

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a person with wide foot.
customer_reviews.text: I need D width shoe to be comfortable. I also have a bunion on outer right foot which sometimes hurts top, side and below foot. On left i have broken my little toe so many times and it can be tender. I have ordered many shoes and almost always return them. Very frustrating! These are perfect! I normally wear a 7 1\2 but with tennis shoes or boots i go for an 8 to allow for socks. These fit perfect. Length is great. Width is perfect. Toe box is wide. The bottom isn't very soft but I plan to use the Edensoles i recently bought. Overall I am thrilled and would definitely buy again. They are definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are by far the best hiking shoes I have ever had.They fit perfectly and were comfortable right out of the box, with no breaking in. They have the arch support and large toe box which I require. Ordinarily I have issues with the size of the toe box in Vasque, so the Mantra was a pleasant surprise. If I could give these shoes six stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: California gal

customer_reviews.title: Well made, comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this particular shoe, liked it so much bought this pair before it was no longer available. I have custom orthotics for plantar fasciitis and required a shoe they fit into that was comfortable. Shoe delivers comfort, is quality made and is a durable workhorse. Still using the 1st pair since 2016 ! My only issue has been they are not slip resistant, as I discovered when stepping into a walk-in cooler where floor was wet.
customer_reviews.author: jct in Olywa

customer_reviews.title: Might buy another pair!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes I've ever had - That's not an exaggeration. They seem to be well-made. I don't anticipate them falling apart for a very long time. I have flat feet and it is very difficult to find shoes that I can stand to wear all day. They are more comfortable than expected. We all have different feet, so maybe that won't be your experience, but for me, I'm tempted to buy another pair before they are discontinued and out of stock!
customer_reviews.author: R. R.

customer_reviews.title: I use with orthotics
customer_reviews.text: Developed some new foot issues and needed more support than the athletic shoes were providing. These don't have the amount of "cushion" I'm used to in other shoes but something about them is very good for my foot. Like other Vasque I have they wear in to your foot the more you wear them, these particular ones are bulky looking on the foot, but they make my foot feel so good I don't care.
customer_reviews.author: RR3

customer_reviews.title: Order your true size
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes but I ordered a half size up and a wide width because I usually get wide or buy Keen shoes. Unfortunately I should have either just ordered the half size up OR a wide width because they are just too big. I've tried thick socks and cinched the laces as tight as they will go but my feet still slide around. Bottom line - good shoes but be mindful of the size you order.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: For me, the fit was off so I had to return the shoes. I purchased the shoes in 8 wide and the width was still not quite enough (I've been measured at several different places and am a classic 7.5 wide with socks on). The heel was oddly big compared to the width also. The shoes did seem like they were well-made though. The sole was pretty thick, which I typically don't like either since I like to feel the floor or ground somewhat when I'm walking - they were too clunky/chunky.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Tigerwing

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support - my favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoes. I've bought them 3 times so far. They are perfect for my feet. I am very picky because I have arthritis and plantar facaitis in my feet, and most shoes make my feet hurt. I have tried so many shoes but only these work. Will buy again when they wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Milbo

customer_reviews.title: Good Winter Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find a smaller size in a hiking shoe that isn't just a cutoff version of a larger size leaving the ball of the foot positioned a bit too far forward. Vasque fits my size (6-1/2). These are durable and solid and fit well from the first wearing and don't need to be broken in. They're an exact replacement for a pair I've worn out (I average 18-20 miles a week mainly on sidewalks and streets) and if it's like my last pair they will readily hold up to the coming inclement weather--rain, mud and snow.
customer_reviews.author: D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: no cushioning
customer_reviews.text: I walk a lot, and have had excellent Vasque shoes. Two pairs I had for 5 years each pair, wore them every day. These? Like walking on cement. No cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Theokas

customer_reviews.title: Good arch support and grippy vibram soles
customer_reviews.text: The way these laces tighten they don't pinch the sides of your feet. The toe of the shoe is composed of mesh and leather material so they don't dig into the top of your toes. Good arch support and grippy vibram soles. Finally.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA LITTLE

customer_reviews.title: 3rd pair, The most comfortable shoes I own !
customer_reviews.text: I would have to say these are the most comfortable shoes I own right out of the box!!! . I put my powerstep insoles in and add the original insole and wow. The shoe does not have enough arch support for me without having my powerstep insole in it though. Nicely made, seems sturdy. The Vibram outsole is meaty ( lots of it ). I bought 2 pairs I liked them so much.
customer_reviews.author: B. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. I'm used to wearing flats, so I was really concerned that it would take me a while to get used to them. However, I had no issues wearing them to work after they arrived. They seem well-made, so I'm pleased so far and can't wait to do some hiking in them soon!
customer_reviews.author: Susan N.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I love these shoes. I have bunions and the wide toe box of these shoes are great for my feet. I wear them to work, hiking, etc. They are great quality and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Vibram soles help these hold up great
customer_reviews.text: I've had these now two years - probably wearing them at least 3/4 of the year, every day - and the Vibram sole is only a little bit worn. The upper exterior doesn't look too bad either. They have removable insoles which I wore through probably in the first 3 or 4 months, so I get new insoles regularly. The main wear is on the inside, where the heel of my inner foot goes, but it doesn't rub or bug my foot. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Squarepants

customer_reviews.title: Waterproofing works, on feet all day
customer_reviews.text: I work with wildlife in all weather conditions. I have worn these shoes for long shifts, and in the rain. One time I had stepped in sinking mud unknowingly, my feet have remained dry! I had difficulty getting the correct size, but I am also not accustomed to hiking shoes. My feet may be between sizes, so I am not blaming the shoe for that. These shoes are comfortable and take the abuse I give them at my job. I have been wearing these for at least a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lightweight shoe with support and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Really great shoes for walking or doing yard work. Comfortable and easy to get on and off. I really like them and the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kcg16

customer_reviews.title: Best hiking shoes I have had in 18 years!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I still have the first pair I bought about 3 years ago. I use to have to replace hiking shoes every season, but these have been great! It is the first time I have rebought the same pair because I liked them so much! I do a lot of hiking and these are comfortable and have great traction on loose rocks.
customer_reviews.author: boatgirl82

customer_reviews.title: Narrow foot and had to return
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in size 7.5N for my narrow foot. In a New Balance shoe, I wear an 8N, which run small. I tried wearing with a thicker hiking sock, but even doing that it was too wide and slipped on my heel. If I went shorter to help with the width, they would have been too short. Seemed like a sturdy shoe for hiking. Disappointed they didn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: It fits great with a very short break in period
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this shoe. It fits great with a very short break in period, and the toe is nice and wide for me. My first pair lasted 5 years so I am looking forward to these lasting just as long!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Martin

customer_reviews.title: Quality made - comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes a lot. They were comfortable straight out of the box and the coloring is true to the picture. I've been walking all over for a few weeks and they've held up perfectly. I would suggest these shoes to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like how supportive this shoe is. I had to remove the inner sole in order to fit my own orthotic inserts inside. Otherwise they are a bit tight. They fit fine with that change.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalyn Richards

customer_reviews.title: love these!
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect, very comfortable to walk in. Use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: EAJ

customer_reviews.title: Seem perfect, I tried them on the day I got ...
customer_reviews.text: Seem perfect, I tried them on the day I got them. Feel great lots of cush This is my second pair of Vasque and very pleased. I wear size 8 M and they fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: 16Paws

customer_reviews.title: u
customer_reviews.text: My last 3 pairs of hiking shoes have been Vasque. This pair feels good, but they come up much higher on my ankle and are more stiff than previous Vasque hiking shoes i have had. I have worn them all day, light duty, and they felt fine after I put in a pair of Dr. Scholl's inserts. They felt even better then. As good as my old Vasque hiking shoes? No
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hiking shoes for the wider foot.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfectly right out of the box. I ordered C/D width as I have a somewhat wider foot and they were perfect. Very comfortable and warm as they are leather. I wear them when my ankle-high Vasque boots are too much. I anticipate many pleasurable hikes in these shoes. Vasque comes through for me again!
customer_reviews.author: K H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Toe room and fits great. Bought second pair before they change the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Mariane Hall

customer_reviews.title: great shoes for wide, high arches
customer_reviews.text: brand new out of the box I went on a 4 mile hike in the mountains. my feet did not hurt at all. i have wide feet and high arches.the shoes are comfortable and felt great even with hiking socks on. will buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Fit good but too heavy. Sent them back for something lighter.
customer_reviews.author: SophieMaria

customer_reviews.title: Great for Narrow Feet
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet and so these shoes fit me very well. The shoes are an excellent version of what they claim to be: a not-fully water-resistant hiking shoe. I wore these for a weekend of hiking (no more than 4 hrs at a time) and experienced no discomfort, not even from breaking them in. I heartily recommend to all you others who have narrow feet!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Simpson

customer_reviews.title: I am sooooo happy with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am sooooo happy with these shoes. Love the fit, color, sturdiness, etc. I based my purchase on the many good reviews and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. Fits perfect, well made , quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I owned this hiking boot for one year but couldn't find it locally to buy it again. I ordered this through Amazon and k again the boot is so amazing that I ordered another one immediately. I hope they never quit making this brand. Great support and the sole is the only kind I trust.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Ellison

customer_reviews.title: My all time favorite boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair over a period of many years. Nothing beats these for comfort, durability and ability to repel water.
customer_reviews.author: Sue C.

customer_reviews.title: With a rupture ed ankle tendon on one foot and ...
customer_reviews.text: With a rupture ed ankle tendon on one foot and a broken toe on the other, I have only one pair of shoes that allow me to walk in comfort. THESE! THANK YOU!!! Please make more in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: vicki biggs-anderson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to return, slightly small, tight fit for any distance walking.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used these boots a couple of times so far but they are so much more comfortable that other "name brand" hiking boots that I tried previously. I do a lot of hiking on rocky trails and have not experienced bottom of the foot pain like other shoes. They look great and feel really sturdy and not that heavy like some boots.
customer_reviews.author: Roobee

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but runs small!
customer_reviews.text: Would have absolutely loved the shoe but they are way to short (small). Even with that said I almost kept them as they were comfortable even with my toes hitting the end of the shoe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yecats

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good width for wide foot but was a bit long for me, unlike most 7.5W
customer_reviews.author: Wolferson

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I tried many brands of low cut hiking shoes. These were the best fitting, sturdiest, and most comfortable. I have a fairly high arch, but not extremely so. I can wear these shoes every day for a several hour hike in redwoods with my dog. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Hoover

customer_reviews.title: They fit great. I just love them
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of Vasque Hiking shoes. They fit great. I just love them. However, I am not certain that they are the Gore-tex.ones My other shoes have a label saying Gore-tex. These shoes have no label saying that. I will keep them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Theatregirl

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are super light weight
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super light weight. Not at all waterproof.. they run big. Have wore basque for years always 9.5 and these are at least a half size to big. But fit well with thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two

customer_reviews.title: Don't take this style out of production
customer_reviews.text: Only shoe that is comfortable after foot reconstruction and metal that remains on the bottom of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Sky watcher

customer_reviews.title: ... the innersole with another kind and they are more comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the innersole with another kind and they are more comfortable to wear.all day.
customer_reviews.author: S. Psota

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe has way better arch support than stated. I have high arches and do not need extra support to be comfortable in them.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were for my wife. She has had several pairs of them over time and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: jimmck

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for those needing a wide width
customer_reviews.text: I liked these shoes so well, this is the second pair I have ordered. Fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are wonderful right out of the box. no break in time needed. no complaints what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: I love Vasque hikers
customer_reviews.text: I love Vasque hikers, and when I finally needed to replace an 6 year old pair that has been my second pair of Vasque hiking shoe (I use these babies! I am a hard hiker on all terrain/rocky terrain & I use my old pairs at work as a pet groomer for years after they served me on the trail), I was worried that even though the shoe looks the same it couldn't be as good, right!? (....because every company these days seems to be in the business of making poorer quality items that 'used' to have a good reputation!) What a relief! It's my favorite hiker all brand new again for the 3rd time!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Vasque Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Shoes for my wife ... she loves them -- substantial, well-made. Her other Vasque products, hiking boots -- same story. She receives many compliments on both.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Chandler

customer_reviews.title: AT hiker
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, heavier when wet. Takes a long time to dry. Aggressive soles slide on wet, flat surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: JUst purchased these although I won't be wearing them much till spring. The fit seems right so far. I like the color and they appear to be well made. Very lightweight on my feet and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Workman

customer_reviews.title: but they were very comfortable. No break-in period required
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Vasque since they run a bit narrow and I have narrow feet. I still had to put inner soles in them, but they were very comfortable. No break-in period required.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Alm

customer_reviews.title: but the Vasque are a good compromise. Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: I would wear a wide shoe if they were more available, but the Vasque are a good compromise. Nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: AbbiesMoms

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love these hikers. Comfortable right out of the box. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Marion

customer_reviews.title: I love Vasque
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Very comfortable, and I like the pink accents.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Bob Saget

customer_reviews.title: a little larger than I expected, however I do like them and will be wearing them to hike in.
customer_reviews.text: They are a little bit heavy but I will adjust. Thet fit okay with heavy wool socks. Amy daughter recommend them to me. she works outside and has 2 pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoe... runs wide
customer_reviews.text: Very solid shoe with a stiff sole as desired. The size ran too short and too wide for my feet. The next size up was too wide ...and lacked the support needed for hiking. After wearing for 18 months I had hoped to replace them with this size. Not possible.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I love them and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: They fit as expected and are true to picture. I love them and highly recommend. I have worn mine everyday since I got them. I wore them in the snow for a few days and I feel the traction/grip is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am replacing a similar brand so I thought I knew my size - these run a bit big.
customer_reviews.author: wobin

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Plus
customer_reviews.text: I have a tough time getting shoes that fit comfortably. I have orthotics that need to replace the insoles. I put these on and gardened for 5 hours in comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Rubylily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Vasque is the only hiking brand I will use. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Walking shoes par excellence!
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite shoe. I can forget about my footing and enjoy the view!
customer_reviews.author: M. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! Very comfortable - didn't even need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Very comfortable - didn't even need to break in. This is my second pair because I like them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent running or walking shoes. I have them on for every 5 mile walk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use my own arch supports and they work well in these shoes
customer_reviews.author: CailinRua

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Felt broke in right out of the box. Not the best looking, but feel great
customer_reviews.author: Diaharp

customer_reviews.title: ... bone several years ago I have had trouble finding comfortable shoes. The Mantra 2
customer_reviews.text: Since I had foot surgery to repair a broken bone several years ago I have had trouble finding comfortable shoes. The Mantra 2.0 is a perfect fit for me and my recent purchase marks my fourth pair. I hope Vasque continues to produce them for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: emerson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes. These are my second pair of these ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. These are my second pair of these shoes and I love them! The customer service was great as I received these shoes in 3 business days. Very satisfied with the service.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Johnson

customer_reviews.title: She loved them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. we took the our west and hiked quite a bit. She loved them.
customer_reviews.author: GMC

customer_reviews.title: Clunky and not a great fit
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Vasque boots but I think the poorest in fit and comfort. These are very heavy boots and the ties don't stay tied. They are somewhat attractive but just too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Best I have found.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and provides more support than cross-training shoes. With the addition of arch supports, for which there is room for, these are a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. Met the gift recipients needs completely. Lots of research done before purchasing and great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: BRK

customer_reviews.title: nice but too big
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, but my foot is sliding around in the front.
customer_reviews.author: SamDeeCal

customer_reviews.title: not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Although I ordered wide (C/D) width, this shoe came nowhere near the width I needed. Might be okay for someone with feet only slightly wider than average.
customer_reviews.author: Sally M. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best all-purpose walking/hiking/work shoes, I LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Y. Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: If your feet do not run narrow, DO NOT ORDER. That being said, I love these shoes because I wear a narrow. I have to lace them tightly and carefully, and I plan to add a heel insert. But finding hiking shoes that fit my narrow feet is a revelation. I wore these on two hikes-- 5.5 and 3.5 miles, as well as several walks on flat paved paths. These required no breaking in and worked great for everything I've done.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Vasque shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been having a hard time with finding shoes that do not hurt my feet after a few months this is my second pair they should last me two years of wearing and still no sore feet the shoes fall apart before the will start hurting my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Michele l Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: On my feet all day shoe has good support i would suggest this shoe to a friend
customer_reviews.author: yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for the first time this weekend on a 7-mile hike. I'm somewhat of a size 8.75 (between a 8.5 and 9) so they were very comfortable, a little extra room that I think will be fine with some inserts. They felt good on the dirt trail terrain, had good control and didn't give me any blisters or pain at all. They felt a little stiff in the beginning but very quickly loosened up.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola B Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Men, try the women's version of these.
customer_reviews.text: While a man, I buy the women's version of this fine shoe 1 1/2 sizes larger than what I usually wear in men's as it is often available for less money. Sometimes substantially less. They seem to fit and feel the same and last just as long. The uppers are well made and I usually wear the soles out first and the women's version has the exact same sole so they last just as long. I really like these shoes, having had both the men's and women's version of these. They are comfortable, long lasting, and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its OK
customer_reviews.text: Its nice and roomy for my wide feet. However, I feel like it got bigger in just one week and now my feet are sliding inside the shoes. Also, I feel like there is zero cushioning, it feels very hard and my back and legs started hurting really bad. I will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria

customer_reviews.title: 0 is love
customer_reviews.text: I returned these and got the vasque breeze 2.0 because the Mantra is not waterproof but the Breeze 2.0 is love them
customer_reviews.author: Annie S.

customer_reviews.title: Too Heavy
customer_reviews.text: After spending a lot of time reading reviews on this type of hiking shoe, I opted to buy the Vasque Mantra 2.0 hiking shoe. I've had Vasque boots in the past and really liked them. However, after receiving it, I realized that it was very heavy, bulky and uncomfortable. I opted for a Merrel instead and haven't looked back.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S. Edmunds

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend and on 2nd pair!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a pair ofVasque Mantra Hiking shoes about 10 years ago and loved them. I much prefer the low shoe as opposed to a boot. I have hiked on all types of surfaces - sand, gravel, dirt, wet granite and have never had an issue with staying on my feet or with slipping. I wear two pairs of hiking socks and have never had an issue with blisters or rubs. I am glad I finally broke down and purchased another pair to find that they were comfortable the first time I put them on. Would highly recommond these hiking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Janice A Himmelreich

product_meta.title: Vasque Womens Mantra 2.0 Vibram-W Mantra 2.0 Vibram-w
product_meta.description: Whether you're out for a short evening stroll or embarking on an all-day adventure, the Vasque Mantra 2. 0 Hiking Shoe offers comfy, anatomically correct support without weighing you down.
